About Me

My name is Saksham Jhawar. I am student at Arizona State University pursuing a Master's of Science in Computer Software Engineering. I like to call myself a programmer, a chef and a traveler. I moved to Tempe, Arizona in 2019. I like to code and shoot videos. My typical Friday Night involves playing Tennis and cracking open some cold ones!

Here's something about this project

NumberNinja

Web application to aid Grade 2nd and Grade 7th students to perform mathematical operations in a visual way. This includes Teachers creating assignment, Students solving them and then Teachers grading them. A web based interactive playground (Google Blockly) can be accessed upon running the application. This playground handles dynamic computation of equations along with providing flexibility to manage history. The operator resrtiction have been imposed based on what grade the student is in.

Here's something about this project

Implementing Machine Learning in Edge Devices

This project proposes an architecture to prevent cloud infrastructure from unneccessary traffic. A Machine Learning model is trained in cloud which in turn sends classifier values to the local system. The local system is connected to various sensors using Arduino Uno board. These sensors send real time data to local machine in order to make real time descisions.
If the real time values go beyond the values specified by the classifier, an alarm is triggered by the Fire Detection system. Similarly, a water pump is activated in case of Water Supply System.

Publication Link:

Implementing Machine Learning on Edge Devices with Limited Working Memory

Here's something about this Internship

Web Developemnt Internship at bharatRohan Airborne Innovations

Developed and deployed a fully function website comprising of 9 pages. This website contains 7 staic pages and 2 dynamic pages. The website offers three main functionalities for two different views.
1) Visitor View : Visitors can learn about the company and its ongoing project through textual and graphical information avaiable on the website. They can use the "Contact Us" form to reach out to the company in case additional information is required.
2) Member View : The members can naviagte to the login page to view exclusive information made avaiable to them.

Website Link: Bharat Rohan Airborne Innovations Pvt. Ltd.
